name: Suspicious Braised Meat
desc: A stewed dish. The stewing process seems to have been bungled, with the ingredients just have been bundled into the pot to cook together, resulting in wilted vegetables that have all but dissolved into the soup, leaving nothing to this pot but the greasy taste of meat...

value.text: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Braised Meat
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Braised Meat.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Carrot
customize.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Braised Meat
customize.desc: A stewed dish. The meat slices were fried first, followed by the vegetable accouterments, after which they were mixed together. The soup was then added and simmered until it thickened. After this patient, slow cooking process, the meat has become soft and tender, bringing those who eat it a down-to-earth satisfaction.

customize.name: Delicious Braised Meat
customize.desc: A stewed dish. The rich soup sauce and fragrant meat combine to give off an irresistible aroma, while the scattered vegetables are crisp instead of soft, enriching the flavor of the dish... so much so that people will tuck in despite the intense heat until there is nothing left but the sauce... Wait, why don't we just dip our bread in that?
